# DefaultShareLinkLabel

**Structure**

The default label used for a share link.

## Declaration

```swift
struct DefaultShareLinkLabel
```

## Overview

You don’t use this type directly. Instead, [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ShareLink] uses it automatically depending on how you create a share link.

## Conforms To

- View
title: DefaultShareLinkLabel
